CustomField.description: Used by flow to evaluate when customer stage should be set
CustomField.formula: AND( CloseDate >= DATE(2019,8,27), NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "On Hold"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Cancelling"),ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Churned"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Auto-Pilot") ) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Sign_off_Date__c)), OR( AND( Today() >= Project_Sign_off_Date__c +90, OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Tier__c, "Tier_3"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Tier__c, "Tier_4"))), AND( Today() >= Project_Sign_off_Date__c +180, OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Tier__c, "Tier_1"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Tier__c, "Tier_2")))), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used by flow to evaluate when customer stage should be set
CustomField.label: Flow: Set Customer Stage
